LEGO® Toy Store Ottawa - Cf Rideau Centre
stores.additionalInfo:
Looking for a Toy Store in Ottawa? The LEGO® Store Cf Rideau Centre is the perfect destination. With awesome in-store features like a Pick & Build Wall and the opportunity to build your own LEGO minifigure, plus a huge range of LEGO sets for all ages, this store has everything you need – and more.

This LEGO® Store is open with the above adjusted hours. Please be advised that the safety of our visitors and team members remains our first priority. We look forward to welcoming you soon and appreciate your participation with our safety guidelines.

stores.name: LEGO® Toy Store Edmonton - West Edmonton
stores.additionalInfo: Looking for a Toy Store in Edmonton? The LEGO® Store West Edmonton is the perfect destination. Head here for a range of exclusive features, activities and demos, including the chance to build your very own custom LEGO minifigure with our Minifigure Factory! And, of course, the very best LEGO sets for children and adults of any age or experience.

stores.name: LEGO® Toy Store Winnipeg - Polo Park

This LEGO® Store is open with the above adjusted hours. Please be advised that the safety of our visitors and team members remains our first priority. We look forward to welcoming you soon and appreciate your participation with our safety guidelines.

stores.name: LEGO® Store Creteil
stores.additionalInfo:
Woohoo! The LEGO® Store Créteil is open! We can’t wait to see you in the shop.

The Créteil store is run by a team from outside the LEGO Group, so some promotions, pricing and inventory may be different from our brand stores.
You can now earn and use LEGO Insiders points in the Créteil store. Don't forget to bring your VIP card with you to earn and redeem those awesome discounts.

Purchases you make at the Créteil store must be returned to the same location. Gift cards and returns purchased through LEGO.com are not accepted at this store.

For more information on using the VIP service, please speak to an in-store advisor.

stores.additionalInfo:
Looking for a Toy Store in Dublin? The LEGO® Store Dublin is the perfect destination. It offers an exciting range of in-store features to enjoy, including a Pick & Build Wall, Minifigure Factory to create your very own LEGO minifigure, and more. Plus, you can explore an awesome range of LEGO sets and LEGO gifts for kids and adults!

Given the huge interest in the Store, we may need to operate a customer queueing system during busy times such a weekends and school holidays. When an operating system is in place, customers will require a wrist band with an allocated time to gain access to the LEGO Store Dublin. To ensure the safety of all customers during these busy periods when a queueing system is in place, we have a 30 minute allowance for customers to enjoy the store. Each wrist band will have a designated time slot and slots are not interchangeable. Once customers have collected their wrist band, they will be able to enter the store at their allocated time. No one will be able to queue in advance of the time stated on their wrist band
